Great Staff!!

name: Ritchie Yadav
text: Takes long time to greet. Much better for online ordering rather than dine in...but the pizza here are the best ones than dominoes or any other pizza hut ..so this is my quick stop to go to for pizzas...

name: chandra shekar
text: I like pizza hot bread sticks here very tasty

name: FiveFourZero0
text: Nice people. Good service. Only complaint is that they didn't put enough topping on my bread sticks... hardly an issue but that's it.

name: Natasha Joe
text: These people make the best pizza I have ever tasted. I've been ordering pizza from pizza hut since I was a kid and I love every second of it. The service is great and the food is always fresh. The prices are very reasonable. I highly recommend Pizza Hut to anyone anywhere anytime.

name: Isaac Nakata
text: It's been years, YEARS since I've step foot in a pizza hut.  When here for a party, and it's a pretty good idea to have kids party here because it isn't busy and the kids could run around a bit.  The service was excellent, it just seems a …More

name: Alireza Saboori
text: Worst experience in awhile at a Pizza Hut. Messed up my order then made it seem like it was my fault. My online order was pretty clear. Had to wait over 30 min for no reason. And the bathrooms were both out of service. Definitely won't order from here anymore

name: Brandon C
text: Now i have never eaten inside so this is purely on the food. All i can say is its great pizza for the price. The pizza isn't greasy like others and its always hot and fresh. They make it fast and have never had a problem. I like the personal pizza , its great for kids

name: yvonne simmons
text: Was good. Staff super great. Very attentive. Quick service. Just was chilly in the restaurant and wish there was a lunch buffet offered.

name: Mason Joshua Pollard
text: Decent lunch pub. They need to bake their pizzas and pastas faster for lunch crowds. Sometime had to wait between 5-10min. to get more. Buffet supposed to be fast and convenience.

name: Bashir Miah
text: We are three friends went during lunch time. The lady in cash register greeted us. We took our choice of pizza and find a table to site. There are some fork and knife rolled over on napkins. When I open one of them I found this scary bug... showed to the lady and she apologize... we decided not to visit anymore.

name: Usman Sheikh
text: Worst Pizza Hut ever. Absolutely no sense of customer service. I asked for the $7.99 deal. She applied the wrong coupon. The manager would not come out to fix the coupon. This place is also very unhygienic.

text: After waiting 40 minutes for my food to be delivered- they called saying they “could not” deliver to my door and instead I had to go downstairs and outside the building to meet their driver in the sidewalk (mind you, their store is like …More

text: Staff super great specially ( JNYANY)Very attentive. Quick service.

text: Very friendly staff. Fast and efficient. Reliable/consistent food. Good prices.

text: They did a really good job on my extra cheesy crust pizza!  And were pretty generous with the toppings.  I was pleased...

name: Dimitrina Doutcheva
text: Love the crust variety and salsa flavors.

name: Ian Larkin
text: Just a FYI this location closed.  The Pizza Hut will operate until its lease ends in early 2020. Then it will be flipped to a  Neopolitan pizza restaurant

name: Christian Rojas
text: One of the last sit in pizza hut’s in the area, and i hope they don’t close. The pizza is always good the service is great. I definitely recommend it.

name: Maya McCarthy
text: I love this Pizza Hut so much. The waitresses here are ALWAYS so kind. It's a very good place no matter what time of day and never crowded no matter the time! Me and my 2 year old son have some great memories here. A great place if you just want to have some food and have a closed off intimate time.

name: Adam G
text: Well, it is pizza hut. Consistent, but more than 4 stars is a lie

name: Margurite Armenta
text: This is the first place I've eaten at since moving, and I absolutely love it! I love their pizzas, and my son is a big fan of this place as well. It s definitely one of our go to places.

name: John Vitt
text: Came for the Buffet. Not impressed. Pretty dirty. Old pizza on the buffet. No pasta. Only reason for 2 stars is the waitress was nice.

name: tarekegn imana
text: Is not good quality and it is rude employ

name: Minh N
text: Made a carry out order during lunch. Came 30 minutes later and pizza still was not ready. Place was not busy at all. Staff was fooling around on their phones.

name: Ms Hicks
text: So this particular Pizza Hut went above and beyond. I explain to them I can't really eat a lot of food without eating some vegetables. When they ran out of lettuce they figured a way to get me a salad. They were kind they were sweet and they followed Common Sense rather than Dogma

name: Marybeth Mercado
text: I ordered 14 pizzas for a party.  I had to call over and over and over again to NOT be hung up on.  They took my money but all I wanted to know was a status, and NO ONE could give that to me without transferring me to the "drivers!!!"  I am not on ignore and the pizzas were to be here over 15 mins ago!!!!  Worst Pizza hut ever

text: Pizza good. Atmosphere seemsold and outdated but in a good way, ya know?

text: Dined in. Waited 40 minutes for pizza and an app. They forgot the other app. Mozzarella sticks are good I guess....

text: Conveniently located and always gets my order right; never had and issue.

name: Tylir Penton
text: If you want to be double charged this is the place to go! I made the mistake of adding a 2$ tip to my carry out order and they double charged me instead.

text: Went in for lunch buffet yesterday but we came at the wrong day. Got a medium pizza and some mozzarella sticks as well as drinks and there was one guy running the whole shop. Not only did he make the food to perfection,  but he also dealt with several other customers without missing a beat. Outstanding service

text: Omg, THIS pizza hut has thee best pizza in the world. I've been on this personal pan pizza kick for a week or two and was disappointed each time I gave into my cravings. One from target and the other from a place in Maryland. The one I had tonight OMG. It was flaky and tasty and umm umm umm worth every calorie and carb.

text:
As many times I visit this Pizza Hut, I should give them 5 stars but holding onto one star because it is not the brightest location you can visit.
But given the fact that Pizza Hut has closed down so many other location in this area, this is the best one among the available choices.

name: Donna E.
text: I hadn't been to Pizza Hut in years only cuz there isn't one near me, but I was in Reston recently, and remembered there was one on Weihle Ave.  So glad I stopped by.  The cheese breadsticks dipped in the marinara were perfectly cheesy and delicious.  I also got a ham & sausage pan pizza. It was an awesome lunch 🍕💯

text: Took more than 2 hours for a simple order of wings and fries. In this day and age, I can get what I orderded in less than half an hour. Pizza hut, you lost a customer. Absolutely disgraceful.

text: SO GROSS!! Our pizza was delivered an hour late. While we waited, we tried to call the store to ask where the pizza was and nobody would answer. When it finally arrived, the pizza was disgusting - like inedible - it was somehow floppy, …More

name: Reggie Kukoc
text: I was in the area to take my boy for a soccer game.  Afterwards, I took him and a friend to get pizza here.  Service was great.  We ordered two medium pizzas.  One veggie lover and the other pepporoni.  The pizza was great quality.  I really recommend here.

name: Arlen Rivera
text: Every time  I order from this place they take an hour and a half for the food to arrive. And when it arrives, it’s cold. When I call to check on the status, I am placed on hold at least twice and then just hung up on. They’re not even apologetic about it.

name: Amy Ellis
text: Pretty deserted, except for 1 employee. Ordered online, forgot to put "for delivery", tried to call to fix that, never answered, so had to drive there. Very annoying, but the food was fine.
